name: Live AI
short_description: AI agentic assistant tailor-made for Roam, instantly working in Roam blocks or Chat panel ! All up-to-date LLMs (including local ones) without limitation, using Roam components (DNPs, sidebar, references, queries...) as context, supporting whole graph queries, Web search, Image generation, PDF, Voice transcription, TTS, Skills...
author: Fabrice Gallet
